UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_COM_BUTTON_Template_Boeing
UseTemplate.TT_VALUE: (L:XMLVAR_COM#COM_INDEX#_CURRENT_FREQ) sp0 l0 0 == if{ 'VHF L' quit } els{ 'VHF C' 'VHF R' l0 1 == ? quit } (R:1:@TT_Package.GT_STATE_OFF)

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_COM_BUTTON_Template_Boeing
UseTemplate.TT_VALUE: (L:XMLVAR_COM#COM_INDEX#_CURRENT_FREQ) sp0 l0 3 == if{ 'HF L' quit } els{ l0 4 == if{ 'HF R' quit } } (R:1:@TT_Package.GT_STATE_OFF)

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_AIRLINER_Base_Template
UseTemplate.GET_STATE_EXTERNAL: #BATTERY_BUS_ID# (>A:BUS LOOKUP INDEX, Number) (A:BUS CONNECTION ON:#MAIN_BUS_ID#, Bool) sp0 (L:XMLVAR_STANDBY_POWER_IS_ON_BAT) sp1
UseTemplate.ENUM_VAL_TO_POS_EXTERNAL: l0 ! if{ #POS_OFF# sp2 g2 } els{ #POS_BAT# #POS_AUTO# l1 ? sp2 g2 } :2 l2

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_AIRLINER_Base_Template
UseTemplate.ENUM_VAL_TO_POS_EXTERNAL: l0 #ENUM_VAL_OFF# == if{ #POS_OFF# sp1 g2 } els{ #POS_ADF# #POS_VOR# l0 #ENUM_VAL_ADF# == ? sp1 g2 } :2 l1

Condition.GET_INIT_STATE_EXTERNAL: (A:AUTOPILOT MASTER, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT FLIGHT DIRECTOR ACTIVE:#ID#, Bool) or sp0 l0 (A:AUTOPILOT FLIGHT DIRECTOR ACTIVE:#ID#, Bool) ! and if{ #ID# (>K:TOGGLE_FLIGHT_DIRECTOR) } l0

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_AUTOPILOT_Push_Template
UseTemplate.GET_STATE_EXTERNAL: (A:AUTOPILOT APPROACH HOLD, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT GLIDESLOPE HOLD, Bool) ! and sp0
UseTemplate.SET_STATE_EXTERNAL: (A:AUTOPILOT APPROACH HOLD, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT GLIDESLOPE HOLD, Bool) and if{ (>H:B747_8_FMC_1_AP_LOC_ARMED) } (>H:B747_8_FMC_1_AP_LOC_ARMED)

True.GPS_DISABLE_CODE: (A:GPS DRIVES NAV1, Bool) if{ (A:GPS APPROACH APPROACH TYPE, Enum) 4 == if{ (>K:TOGGLE_GPS_DRIVES_NAV1) } } els{ (A:GPS APPROACH APPROACH TYPE, Enum) 10 == if{ (>K:TOGGLE_GPS_DRIVES_NAV1) } }

UseTemplate.Name: ASOBO_AUTOPILOT_Push_Template
UseTemplate.GET_STATE_EXTERNAL: (A:AUTOPILOT APPROACH HOLD, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT GLIDESLOPE HOLD, Bool) and sp0
UseTemplate.SET_STATE_EXTERNAL: #GPS_DISABLE_CODE# (A:AUTOPILOT APPROACH HOLD, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT GLIDESLOPE HOLD, Bool) ! and if{ (>H:B747_8_FMC_1_AP_APP_ARMED) } (>H:B747_8_FMC_1_AP_APP_ARMED)

Case.EMISSIVE_CODE_ACTIVE: (A:AUTOPILOT THROTTLE ARM, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT AIRSPEED HOLD, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT MACH HOLD, Bool) or and
Case.IS_SWITCH_ON: (A:AUTOPILOT THROTTLE ARM, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT AIRSPEED HOLD, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT MACH HOLD, Bool) or and

False.IS_SWITCH_ON: (A:AUTOPILOT AIRSPEED HOLD, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT MACH HOLD, Bool) or
False.EMISSIVE_CODE_ACTIVE: (A:AUTOPILOT AIRSPEED HOLD, Bool) (A:AUTOPILOT MACH HOLD, Bool) or
